remarks:
Equivalent wff's yield equal class abstractions (deduction rule). (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.) 

---

 Equivalent wff's yield equal class abstractions (deduction rule). (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2016.)
statement:
abbid.1 $e |- F/ x ph $.
abbid.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
abbid $p |- ( ph -> { x | ps } = { x | ch } ) $.
